projects.title: CODE DEPLOYER
projects.description: Built a project using NodeJS, TypeScript, AWS S3 and Redis that automates the process of cloning, building and deploying a react project on machine.

projects.title: COURSE HUB
projects.description: Subscription based learning platform with payment Integration, users can search, request, purchase, watch videos. Admins can watch stats on dashboard, manage roles, users, courses.

projects.title: DevSecOps
projects.description: Deployed robust application on AWS EC2 using Docker, Jenkins, SonarQube, Trivy FS, Prometheus, Grafana, Owasp dependency check, Kubernetes and ArgoCD for efficient resource management, CI/CD, Code Quality, System Monitoring and Visualization, Application security and High Availability.

projects.title: CRYPTON
projects.description: Crypto currency real time information provider app using ReactJS, shows top 100 coin exchanges, market value in three currencies, built-in graph and lot more.

projects.title: CART
projects.description: A simple demonstration of cart in an E Commerce Website, can add, delete, update products and purchase Item.
